import re

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    for i in range(k):
        s = re.sub(r'a.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'b.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'c.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'd.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'e.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'f.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'g.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'h.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'i.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'j.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'k.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'l.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'm.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'n.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'o.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'p.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'q.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'r.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r's.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r't.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'u.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'v.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'w.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'x.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'y.*', '', s, count=1)
        s = re.sub(r'z.*', '', s, count=1)
    print(s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
